projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.

projects.name: Quantum Information
projects.summary: Quantum information is the information of the state of a quantum system. It is the basic entity of study in quantum information theory, and can be manipulated using quantum information processing techniques.

projects.name: Enhancing Peptide-HLA Class I Binding Prediction through Siamese Network-Based Contrastive Learning Framework with Feature Fusion (펩타이드-HLA Class I 결합 예측 강화를 위한 특징 융합 기반 시암 네트워크 대조 학습 프레임워크)
projects.summary: Quantum cryptography is the science of exploiting quantum mechanical properties to perform cryptographic tasks. The best known example of quantum cryptography is quantum key distribution which offers an information-theoretically secure solution to the key exchange problem.

projects.name: Identification of human 2'-O-methylation (2OM) sites using a hybrid deep learning framework (하이브리드 딥 러닝 프레임워크를 사용한 인간 2'-O-메틸화(2OM) 부위 식별)
projects.summary: Quantum communication is a field of applied quantum physics closely related to quantum information processing and quantum teleportation. Its most interesting application is protecting information channels against eavesdropping by means of quantum cryptography.

projects.name: Development of a direct-acting universal antiviral drug (DAUAD) for the treatment of future new/variant RNA viruses including SARS-CoV-2 variants (SARS-CoV-2 변이주를 포함한 미래 발생 가능한 신/변종 RNA 바이러스 치료를 위한 Direct acting universal antiviral drug (DAUAD) 개발)
projects.summary: Quantum teleportation is a technique for transferring quantum information from a sender at one location to a receiver some distance away. While teleportation is commonly portrayed in science fiction as a means to transfer physical objects from one location to the next, quantum teleportation only transfers quantum information.
